Hi ����,

Which libraries did it fail to find? You could see if running maven from
the command-line helps (if you weren't already doing it). Change to the
Heritrix main directory and type "mvn install". Yes, you can also try
manually downloading the jars. Say if "log4j 1.2.14" fails to download
then you should be able to just download log4j-1.2.14.jar and put it in
~/.m2/repository/log4j/log4j/1.2.14/.

Cheers,

Alex

���� wrote:
> I download Hritrix-2.0 source code , and imported to Eclipse(installed
> maven2eclipse plugin).
> Then building the projects, and downloading the librarys to maven
> repository.
> But the library so huge that took much time.
> Unfortunately��it failed finally in finding some libs.
> Could I directly download the libs. should I modify the files of
> pom.xml ?
> I don't kown maven. Could you have some suggestion for me?
> thanks very much!
